Empyre65 wrote:I found nothing like this build in the search engine.
Did you search on rogue/monk/sd?

Monk 20/Rogue 10/SD 10 monk 20 / rogue 10 / shadowdancer 10 (human) by InsaneShadow
The Acolyte of Shadows monk 20 / rogue 19 / shadowdancer 1 (elf) by Stravinsky00
Mini Monk v2 monk 25 / rogue 10 / shadowdancer 5 (halfling) by Aakanaar
Stealthy Monk 20 / SD 5 / Rogue 15 monk 20 / shadowdancer 5 / rogue 15 (human) by Ahriman Dragonhand
Fur Vitae rogue 19 / monk 20 / shadowdancer 1 (human) by Mithdradates
Death's Hand rogue 19 / monk 20 / shadowdancer 1 (elf) by Mithdradates

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Those all have more Monk and less Rogue, and some of them only have 1 level of Shadowdancer, not even close the the class distribution of this build.

Also, I'm posting to correct an error I made describing the build. With no full-BAB class, this build has only up to 9 attacks per round, not 10 like I said earlier. Still, 9 is a lot.

posts.author: KailPendragon
posts.content: Rogue 29/SD 1 gets the same number of feats, +2d6 SA and +8 skillpoints in exchange of -8 HPs. Shadow daze and Shadow evade are negligible to say the least.

posts.content: That sounds like a significant improvement. Thanks!
